mapper.sql: id, name, enable, creator, create_time, remark, offline_time, update_time, updator, thesort, online_time, img
mapper.insert:
insert into zs_subject
id,
name,
enable,
creator,
create_time,
remark,
offline_time,
update_time,
updator,
thesort,
online_time,
img,
#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{enable,jdbcType=CHAR},
#{creator,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{create_time,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{offline_time,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{update_time,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{updator,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{thesort,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{online_time,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{img,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
mapper.update:
update zs_subject
name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
enable = #{enable,jdbcType=CHAR},
creator = #{creator,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
create_time = #{create_time,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
offline_time = #{offline_time,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
update_time = #{update_time,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
updator = #{updator,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
thesort = #{thesort,jdbcType=INTEGER},
online_time = #{online_time,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
img = #{img,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select count(*) from zs_subject where enable != 1 and id != #{id} and name = #{name}
